name: MagLab
description:
Your facility has been overrun by evil robots! Now it's up to you, armed only with your prototype magnet gun, to fend off the attackers for as long as possible. Can you reach the top of the leaderboard?

Controls:

WASD: Move
Right Click: Attract object, or drop held object
Left Click: Fire held object
ESC: Pause

Made for Scorespace 18, theme: MAGNETIC
